name: Green Desk
description:
Greendesk has emerged from the collective experience, knowledge and creativity harvested over the last five years through the activities of a successful team of entrepreneurs and business leaders.
Greendesk is unique because it enables effective control of organisations’ utility, waste and transport impacts through a single, intuitive cloud-based application.  Greendesk makes it easy to upload historical data, manage current performance and plan future business strategy.  Greendesk ensures cost, consumption and carbon reduction opportunities are realised through its engaging and accessible interface and outputs.

product_images.title: Greendesk
product_images.description: Greendesk is the next generation of resource management software that allows users to measure and manage their core business costs.
